title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 151.13 - Estates and trusts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 151.13 - Estates and trusts

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 651 (e)

The New York State fiduciary income tax return for an
estate or trust must be made on form IT-205 (supplemented in certain instances
by form IT-205-A) and filed by the fiduciary. When the fiduciary is a trustee
of two or more trusts, he must make a separate New York State fiduciary income
tax return for each trust, even though such trusts were created by the same
grantor for the same beneficiary or beneficiaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
151.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
